1063850.name: Jinxed
1063850.description:
Take a ride with Jinx, our very own master of mystery. He will entertain you as you travel through his strange and captivating world.

Prepare to be Jinxed on this virtual reality ghost train ride.

This is a surreal and entertaining ‘ghost train’ style ride with a bit of ‘roller-coaster’ thrill mix.

A VR experience like no other! High quality, fully rendered CGI with real-time content (a combination Immotion Studios are known for crafting) result in a highly enjoyable, immersive ride.

Game Play: Sit back and enjoy the great visuals and sound (VR roller coaster, ghost train ride)

[This is a 360 render video]
1063850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
